com.hyprmx.android.sdk.api
Class ApiRequestHandler<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.hyprmx.android.sdk.api.ApiRequestHandler<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the expected type of object returned by the endpoint.
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.roobit.android.restclient.RestClient.OnCompletionListener
public class ApiRequestHandler<T>
extends Object
implements com.roobit.android.restclient.RestClient.OnCompletionListener

A template for an API request that manages the entire round trip to an endpoint and simply pops out an object of the appropriate type at the end of the request. All networking and object unmarshaling is performed on the RestClient's AsyncTask background thread, and users' OnComplete methods are guaranteed to be called from the UI thread.

Author:
bjdupuis

Nested Class Summary
static interface ApiRequestHandler.OnRequestFinishedListener
          This listener is called whenever the request finishes in any way.

ApiRequestHandler

public ApiRequestHandler(com.roobit.android.restclient.RestClient client,
                         ApiHelper.OnComplete<T> listener,
                         Class<T> type,
                         int requestTag)
A constructor that also takes a tag argument. This is useful for request types that have the same type T expected result but different listeners (e.g. sign in and sign up)

Parameters:
client - the rest client
listener - the listener to be called on completion
type - the expected type of result
requestTag - the caller-specified tag to identify the request
